long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mark stresses in Russian text.

Enter a text in Russian, and this extension will return the same text with the stressed vowels marked on any words containing two or more vowels (but not containing ё). The extension queries где-ударение.рф to retrieve the stress for each word requiring stress. Stress results for individual words are stored locally by your browser to speed future queries that contain the same words.
